text:
Allison Mack (born July 29, 1982) is an American movie director, actress and producer. She played Chloe Sullivan in the television series "Smallville". She played Kate Jacobs in the television series "Opposite Sex".
Mack was born in Preetz, West Germany to American parents.
Mack was arrested by the FBI in Brooklyn on April 20, 2018, on charges of sex trafficking, sex trafficking conspiracy and forced labor conspiracy. She faces 15 years-to-life in prison.
